label: $P3
name: p3dollar
description: A generalization of the $P 2D recognizer that supports 3D multi-stroke gestures. To keep memory usage and execution time low, gestures are represented as unordered sets of points, called point clouds.

settings.label: Number of sampling points
settings.name: samplingPoints
settings.description: The number of points of the gesture after resampling.

settings.label: Points
settings.name: points
settings.description: The points that are used by the recognizer.
